verses.verse: Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> after their number <S%H4557><s%>, to wit, the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> and hundreds <S%H3967><s%>, and their officers <S%H7860><s%> that served <S%H8334><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> in any matter <S%H1697><s%> of the courses <S%H4256><s%>, which came in <S%H935><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> by month <S%H2320><s%> throughout all the months <S%H2320><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>, of every <S%H259><s%> course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

Over the first <S%H7223><s%> course <S%H4256><s%> for the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Jashobeam <S%H3434><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdiel <S%H2068><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.
Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> was the chief <S%H7218><s%> of all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> for the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.

And over the course <S%H4256><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Dodai <S%H1737><s%> an Ahohite <S%H266><s%>, and of his course <S%H4256><s%> was Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> also the ruler <S%H5057><s%>: in his course <S%H4256><s%> likewise were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The third <S%H7992><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> for the third <S%H7992><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%>, a chief <S%H7218><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

This is that Benaiah <S%H1141><s%>, who was mighty <S%H1368><s%> among the thirty <S%H7970><s%>, and above the thirty <S%H7970><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> was Ammizabad <S%H5990><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

The fourth <S%H7243><s%> captain for the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%>, and Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The fifth <S%H2549><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> for the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Shamhuth <S%H8049><s%> the Izrahite <S%H3155><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The sixth <S%H8345><s%> captain for the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Ira <S%H5896><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ikkesh <S%H6142><s%> the Tekoite <S%H8621><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The seventh <S%H7637><s%> captain for the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Helez <S%H2503><s%> the Pelonite <S%H6397><s%>, of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The eighth <S%H8066><s%> captain for the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Sibbecai <S%H5444><s%> the Hushathite <S%H2843><s%>, of the Zarhites <S%H2227><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The ninth <S%H8671><s%> captain for the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the Anetothite <S%H6069><s%>, of the Benjamites <S%H1145><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The tenth <S%H6224><s%> captain for the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the Netophathite <S%H5200><s%>, of the Zarhites <S%H2227><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> captain for the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%>, of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

The twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> captain for the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Heldai <S%H2469><s%> the Netophathite <S%H5200><s%>, of Othniel <S%H6274><s%>: and in his course <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

¶ Furthermore over the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: the ruler <S%H5057><s%> of the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> was Eliezer <S%H461><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri <S%H2147><s%>: of the Simeonites <S%H8099><s%>, Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maachah <S%H4601><s%>:
Of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kemuel <S%H7055><s%>: of the Aaronites <S%H175><s%>, Zadok <S%H6659><s%>:
Of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Elihu <S%H453><s%>, one of the brethren <S%H251><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>: of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, Omri <S%H6018><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael <S%H4317><s%>:
Of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, Ishmaiah <S%H3460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Obadiah <S%H5662><s%>: of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, Jerimoth <S%H3406><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azriel <S%H5837><s%>:

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, Hoshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaziah <S%H5812><s%>: of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, Joel <S%H3100><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedaiah <S%H6305><s%>:

Of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, Iddo <S%H3035><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>: of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, Jaasiel <S%H3300><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abner <S%H74><s%>:
Of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, Azareel <S%H5832><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham <S%H3395><s%>. These were the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

¶ But David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> not the number <S%H4557><s%> of them from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and under <S%H4295><s%>: because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> he would increase <S%H7235><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> like to the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.

Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to number <S%H4487><s%>, but he finished <S%H3615><s%> not, because there fell wrath <S%H7110><s%> for it <S%H2063><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>; neither was the number <S%H4557><s%> put <S%H5927><s%> in the account <S%H4557><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>.

¶ And over the king's <S%H4428><s%> treasures <S%H214><s%> was Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adiel <S%H5717><s%>: and over the storehouses <S%H214><s%> in the fields <S%H7704><s%>, in the cities <S%H5892><s%>, and in the villages <S%H3723><s%>, and in the castles <S%H4026><s%>, was Jehonathan <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%>:

And over them that did <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> for tillage <S%H5656><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> was Ezri <S%H5836><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chelub <S%H3620><s%>:

And over the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> was Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the Ramathite <S%H7435><s%>: over the increase of the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> for the wine <S%H3196><s%> cellars <S%H214><s%> was Zabdi <S%H2067><s%> the Shiphmite <S%H8225><s%>:

And over the olive trees <S%H2132><s%> and the sycomore trees <S%H8256><s%> that were in the low plains <S%H8219><s%> was Baal-hanan <S%H1177><s%> the Gederite <S%H1451><s%>: and over the cellars <S%H214><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> was Joash <S%H3135><s%>:

And over the herds <S%H1241><s%> that fed <S%H7462><s%> in Sharon <S%H8289><s%> was Shitrai <S%H7861><s%> the Sharonite <S%H8290><s%>: and over the herds <S%H1241><s%> that were in the valleys <S%H6010><s%> was Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adlai <S%H5724><s%>:
Over the camels <S%H1581><s%> also was Obil <S%H179><s%> the Ishmaelite <S%H3459><s%>: and over the asses <S%H860><s%> was Jehdeiah <S%H3165><s%> the Meronothite <S%H4824><s%>:

And over the flocks <S%H6629><s%> was Jaziz <S%H3151><s%> the Hagerite <S%H1905><s%>. All these were the rulers <S%H8269><s%> of the substance <S%H7399><s%> which was king <S%H4428><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%>.

Also Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> uncle <S%H1730><s%> was a counseller <S%H3289><s%>, a wise <S%H995><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, and a scribe <S%H5608><s%>: and Jehiel <S%H3171><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hachmoni <S%H2453><s%> was with the king's <S%H4428><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>:
And Ahithophel <S%H302><s%> was the king's <S%H4428><s%> counseller <S%H3289><s%>: and Hushai <S%H2365><s%> the Archite <S%H757><s%> was the king's <S%H4428><s%> companion <S%H7453><s%>:

And after <S%H310><s%> Ahithophel <S%H302><s%> was Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah <S%H1141><s%>, and Abiathar <S%H54><s%>: and the general <S%H8269><s%> of the king's <S%H4428><s%> army <S%H6635><s%> was Joab <S%H3097><s%>.
